name: Mini Pelican
description: When diving, you can use the Mini Pelican to speed up. Drains endurance continuously when moving, but slowly recovers endurance when you stop moving. Cooldown: **90** seconds. Mini Pelican can store **2** charges. **Diving light** will be automatically turned on when you use the Mini Pelican, illuminating the surrounding area.
advancements: Recover to full endurance when using the Mini Pelican, not effective when exhausted.
Mini Pelican can store up to **3** charges.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduces cooldown to **30** seconds and unlocks Mini Pelican's new paint: **Pigmentation**.
